DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics LCQ908 Patients With Renal Impairment
DOC.criteria: Individuals renal impairment Estimated Creatinine Clearance ( CLcr ) CockroftGault equation ≤80mL/min ; Mild renal impairment define CLcr 5080 mL/min Moderate renal impairment define CLcr 3050 mL/min Severe renal impairment define CLcr < 30 mL/min Healthy subject • Estimated CLcr CockroftGault equation > 80mL/min All Individuals A past medical history clinically significant ECG abnormality family history prolong QTinterval syndrome . Female subject must non child bear potential use effective method contraception . Individuals renal impairment Renal transplant time . Subjects undergo method dialysis ( hemodialysis , peritoneal dialysis ) within last 3 month . History clinically significant chronic recurrent urinary tract infection active require antibiotic treatment within past 30 day . Any medication contraindicate moderate severe renally impaired population Healthy subject History presence impair renal function indicate clinically significantly abnormal creatinine BUN and/or urea value , abnormal urinary constituent ( e.g. , albuminuria ) Evidence urinary obstruction difficulty void screen History presence hepatitis B C and/or positive Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) Hepatitis C test result screening . Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
